solution_line_template: Dan takes {dan_licks} licks, Michael takes {michael_licks}, Sam takes {sam_licks}, David takes {david_licks} and Lance takes {lance_licks} for a total of {dan_licks}+{michael_licks}+{sam_licks}+{david_licks}+{lance_licks} = <<{dan_licks}+{michael_licks}+{sam_licks}+{david_licks}+{lance_licks}={total_licks}>>{total_licks} licks

There are {number_of_people} people and the total amount of licks is {total_licks} so the average is {total_licks}/{number_of_people} = <<{total_licks}/{number_of_people}={average_licks}>>{average_licks} licks to get to the center of a lollipop
